site_title: Smiling Face Emoji by Jo Nakashima

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Wow, 500+ subscribers! Thank-you for supporting my channel. You made me smile today! Learn how to fold an Origami Smiling Face Emoji design by Jo Nakashima. Less than a minute origami. Enjoy!!! Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
